Name: GOLD MINER CHALLENGER
About the game: First person destruction game, you are alone with your pickaxe facing a rock the objective is to destroy rocks to collect gold nuggets. if you have enough nuggets you can unlock a new ultra-stylish pickaxe with a total of 12 pickaxes at the start of the game. You can compete with another player in a ranking of destruction speed and number of gold nuggets collected. Game designed for all ages Play at your own pace, Play to relax, Play to let off steam, Play to be the first. 'some functionality will not be available when the game is released (Rankings)'
